topics.title: Topics
topics.description: Comma-separated list of topics to scrape; as given on ted.com/talks. Pass all for all topics. Exclusive with playlists and links, only one must be set.

playlists.title: TED Playlists
playlists.description: Comma-separated list of TED playlist IDs to scrape. Pass all for all playlists. Exclusive with topics and links, only one must set.

links.title: Links
links.description: Comma-separated TED talk URLs to scrape, each in the format: https://www.ted.com/talks/<talk_slug>. Exclusive with topics and playlists, only one must set.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Comma-separated list of ISO-639-3 language codes to filter videos. Do not pass this parameter for all languages

subtitles_enough.title: Subtitles enough?
subtitles_enough.description: Whether to include videos that have a subtitle in requested language(s) if audio is in another language

subtitles.title: Subtitles Setting
subtitles.description: Language setting for subtitles. all: include all available subtitles, matching (default): only subtitles matching language(s), none: include no subtitle. Also accepts comma-separated list of language(s)

video_format.title: Video format
video_format.description: Format to download/transcode video to. webm is smaller

autoplay.title: Autoplay videos
autoplay.description: Enable autoplay on videos. Behavior differs on platforms/browsers

name.title: Name
name.description: ZIM name. Used as identifier and filename (date will be appended)

title.title: Title
title.description: Custom title for your ZIM. Based on selection otherwise

description.title: Description
description.description: Custom description for your ZIM. Based on selection otherwise

long_description.title: Long description
long_description.description: Custom long description for your ZIM. Based on selection otherwise

creator.title: Content Creator
creator.description: Name of content creator. Defaults to TED

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: List of comma-separated Tags for the ZIM file. category:ted, ted, and _videos:yes added automatically

optimization_cache.title: Optimization Cache URL
optimization_cache.description: URL with credentials and bucket name to S3 Optimization Cache

use_any_optimized_version.title: Use any optimized version
use_any_optimized_version.description: Use the cached files if present, whatever the version

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`

tmp_dir.title: Temp folder
tmp_dir.description: Where to create temporay build folder. Leave it as `/output`

zim_file.title: ZIM filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (based on ZIM name if not provided)

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of parallel threads to use while downloading

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: The locale to use for the translations in ZIM

language_threshold.title: Language Threshold
language_threshold.description: Add language in ZIM metadata only if present in at least this percentage of videos. Number between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5: language must be used in 50% of videos to be considered as ZIM language.
